dcterms:description: HotpotQA is an open-domain question-answering dataset based on Wikipedia, primarily focused on common knowledge such as movies, sports, history facts, etc. Most of the questions in HotpotQA are in the form of multi-hop questions, requiring multiple steps of reasoning and summarization to arrive at an answer.
dcterms:title: HotpotQA
